title: Ward Skin Selector
body:
My ward skin selector is not loading in during champ select (since the patch).
I've run the repair and it didn't fix anything.

I also did not get my Mastery 6 Token for Leona when I got an S- on her. The message appeared in the post game lobby, but the item never showed up in my hextech area.

Also tried to send a support ticket before posting this. It wouldn't let me sign in on the support page.

replies.body:
Hey there,

Is this still an issue for you?

If you're experiencing issues signing into the support page, these can usually be remedied by using a different browser or opening an "incognito" tab in your current browser and then attempting to log in.

the signing in thing yes.

The ward skin selector got fixed with the last hotfix to fix the dc'ing issue.

Edit: Using a different browser worked. cheers.

Good to hear everything is working again :)

See you on the rift.
